article:
Mr Baker lived in a small town. Nobody was    _  than him there, but he wished to
get  more  money all the time. One day, on his way
home, he found there was a  _  on the ground. He
picked it up and put it into his pocket. That evening after he had supper, he
brought it out and began to  _  it in the room.
He was interested in a piece of news on it. Some gold  was discovered  in a desert  . He was afraid someone would know about it and he started off,     _  telling
anybody about it. He tried to find the place  _  gold
was.
The greedy   man walked on the desert for two weeks, but he didn't find any gold and his food and water was    _  .
His horse was so weak that he couldn't  _  it. He
had to go back to his hometown, but it was too  _  . His horse at last died and he was too hungry and thirsty to go any  _  . He looked around, there was nothing  _  sand.
Suddenly he saw a man  _  on the ground far away.
He crawled   to him and found he was dead, with a bag in his hand. He hurried to open the bag to find something to    _  , but it was full of gold. He threw it away. As he was dying, he cried and
said, "Now, a bag of bread is far more  _  than a
bag of gold. How unhappy I am!"
